main event: On 7 May 1949, a civilian reported seeing a bright shining object estimated to be the size of a dinner plate from her front porch in Limona, Florida.
interesting points: The object moved in a quivering motion and was first seen through the treetops before rising higher,The object was described as having a ragged, flaming border that drooped at the bottom,The sighting lasted for approximately 15 minutes and was observed by a 60-year-old public health nurse,The estimated speed of the object was between 20-40 mph and it emitted no sound,The report states there were no visible means of support, propulsion, or control.
sighted object: a bright shining object with a ragged flaming border
